title: Strengthening Teaching Method Practical Competencies: Project Management Through Mobile-Based Scrum Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic project management concepts and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain core elements of the Scrum framework (sprints, daily Scrums, backlog management, etc.) with 80% accuracy.
Learners enhance decision-making skills by practicing Scrum event operations procedures over three times via mobile simulation games.
Learners can propose at least two risk management strategies for real project environments through team-based simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
